ID: C1206UG_00
From: Watson, Ryan 01 <Ryan.Watson01@marsh.com>
To: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
CC: Yesilmen, Gulistan <Gulistan.Yesilmen@marsh.com>
BCC: 
Date: 2025-08-21 06:52
Subject: Welcome to Marsh Central
--------------------------------------------------
CAUTION: This email originated from outside of the organization. Do not click links or open attachments unless you recognize the sender and know the content is safe. 
تم إرسال هذا البريد الإلكتروني من خارج مجموعة شلهوب. لا تنقر على الروابط أو تفتح المرفقات إلا إذا كنت تعرف المرسل وتعلم أنه آمن


Dear Hagop,

 

We are excited to introduce our claims and cyber incident platform, Marsh Central, designed to streamline your cyber preparedness and response capabilities. The platform contains automated onboarding and a mobile-friendly experience, putting vital resources at your fingertips in the event of a cyber incident.

 

Key Features


Before an incident - 

*	Cyber Incident Preparation – Securely collaborate with stakeholders, manage approved vendors, and store critical documents such as policies and response plans.
*	Cyber Claims & Incident Management Best Practices – Here, you have access to videos, tip sheets, and real-time updates on cyber claims best practices, regulations, and cyber incident response strategies. 
*	Vendor Management – Review your vendor panel and request off-panel vendors.

*	Cyber Incident Preparation – Securely collaborate with stakeholders, manage approved vendors, and store critical documents such as policies and response plans.
*	Cyber Claims & Incident Management Best Practices – Here, you have access to videos, tip sheets, and real-time updates on cyber claims best practices, regulations, and cyber incident response strategies. 
*	Vendor Management – Review your vendor panel and request off-panel vendors.

 

During an incident - 

*	Incident Response – Report incidents to Marsh and manage live cyber events, even if your network is compromised or down. You also have access to an integrated audit trail that supports post-incident analysis. 
*	Out-of-Band Communication – Connect with key stakeholders and external resources to manage a cyber crisis through a secure communication and collaboration channel.
*	Plan in your Pocket – Access to your critical documents when you need it most, through browser or a mobile app.

 

Shortly, you’ll receive an invite from (no-reply@CYGNVS.com <mailto:no-replay@CYGNVS.com> ) with a link to the platform. Once you register, I encourage you to Schedule a Demo <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/SQIbCqMy4T6ZKnlSZfPsEJZHz?domain=urldefense.com>  with an onboarding specialist for a walkthrough of the platform features! If you have any questions, don’t hesitate to reply to this email.

Shortly, you’ll receive an invite from (no-reply@CYGNVS.com <mailto:no-replay@CYGNVS.com> ) with a link to the platform. Once you register, I encourage you to Schedule a Demo <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/SQIbCqMy4T6ZKnlSZfPsEJZHz?domain=urldefense.com>  with an onboarding specialist for a walkthrough of the platform features! If you have any questions, don’t hesitate to reply to this email.

 

Please note that you are under no obligation to enter into a business relationship with any vendor referred to you by Marsh.  Whether to do so is in your sole discretion. Marsh is not responsible for the performance, acts or omissions of any vendor.  If you choose to enter into a business relationship with a vendor referred by Marsh, please note that Marsh may receive a referral fee or other compensation from the vendor in connection with the vendor’s provision of services to you.

 

Thank you!

Ryan

 

 

Ryan Watson

Marsh Cyber

Ryan.Watson01@marsh.com <mailto:alice.shvartsberg@marsh.com>

Dear Hagop,

 

We are excited to introduce our claims and cyber incident platform, Marsh Central, designed to streamline your cyber preparedness and response capabilities. The platform contains automated onboarding and a mobile-friendly experience, putting vital resources at your fingertips in the event of a cyber incident.

 

Key Features


Before an incident -

We are excited to introduce our claims and cyber incident platform, Marsh Central, designed to streamline your cyber preparedness and response capabilities. The platform contains automated onboarding and a mobile-friendly experience, putting vital resources at your fingertips in the event of a cyber incident.

 

Key Features


Before an incident -

*	Cyber Incident Preparation – Securely collaborate with stakeholders, manage approved vendors, and store critical documents such as policies and response plans.
*	Cyber Claims & Incident Management Best Practices – Here, you have access to videos, tip sheets, and real-time updates on cyber claims best practices, regulations, and cyber incident response strategies.
*	Vendor Management – Review your vendor panel and request off-panel vendors.

 

During an incident -

*	Incident Response – Report incidents to Marsh and manage live cyber events, even if your network is compromised or down. You also have access to an integrated audit trail that supports post-incident analysis.
*	Out-of-Band Communication – Connect with key stakeholders and external resources to manage a cyber crisis through a secure communication and collaboration channel.
*	Plan in your Pocket – Access to your critical documents when you need it most, through browser or a mobile app.

*	Incident Response – Report incidents to Marsh and manage live cyber events, even if your network is compromised or down. You also have access to an integrated audit trail that supports post-incident analysis.

*	Plan in your Pocket – Access to your critical documents when you need it most, through browser or a mobile app.
